import SubmitButton from './SubmitButton' import TextInput from './TextInput' import { useCart } from '../contexts/CartContext' function DishListItem ({ dish }) { const { attributes } = dish console.log(attributes) const { addToCart } = useCart() const handleClick = () => { addToCart(dish) } return (
{attributes.name.toUpperCase()}

) } export default DishListItem
